mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(bno, title, content, writer) VALUES (seq_board.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, viewcount FROM board ORDER BY bno DESC
SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, viewcount FROM board WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET viewcount = viewcount + 1 WHERE bno = #{bno}
UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updatedate = SYSDATE WHERE bno = #{bno}
